fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE TELLS YOU ABOUT LYNCHING
Conceptualization: "It's almost an anthropological sigh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's almost an anthropological sight: watching him try to assert dominance over you.

fields.Title: You: ""*How* did you kill him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*How* did you kill him?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "Titus grins. "I think you got your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus grins. "I think you got your answer, Mr. Law."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Well..." He picks up his beer can...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." He picks up his beer can. "Maybe you should just fuck off then?"

fields.Title: You: ""You murdered him just like that --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You murdered him just like that -- no remorse?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, who do you think we are?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, who do you think we are?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""About fuckin' time.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "About fuckin' time."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Just keep talking. Put something on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just keep talking. Put something on the table. Something incriminating.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We all got a pair." He squints. "W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We all got a pair." He squints. "We wore them the night we took the Pretty Boy out back and hung him. By the neck."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant waits for your reply..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant waits for your reply. Patiently. His foot taps only a little.

fields.Title: Half Light: "As he speaks, his fists contract, g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As he speaks, his fists contract, going through the pulling motion again, savouring it.

fields.Title: Logic: "When the shit starts spinning it wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: When the shit starts spinning it will *not* land on Mr. Claire -- that's the deal here. The fixer will ignore the notion completely, focusing on Titus' culpability.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This is where he tries to sow disco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is where he tries to sow discord between you two -- because he knows the company is responsible for bringing the mercenaries into town.

fields.Title: Logic: "The autopsy did not reveal anything..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The autopsy did not reveal anything too conflicting this far. You just have to wing it.

fields.Title: You: ""We need more. Did you muffle him?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need more. Did you muffle him? We haven't heard any reports of screams."

fields.Title: Shanky: "This little rat-faced fellow is sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This little rat-faced fellow is solid, too. Always fidgety, yes -- but no change there.

fields.Title: Fat Angus: "This one -- he's sweating profusely..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one -- he's sweating profusely and has difficulty breathing. They've smartly kept him out of the conversation thus far. Definitely the weakest link in the chain.

fields.Title: Authority: "Weren't you warned to *not* go down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Weren't you warned to *not* go down this path?! And yet you *still* go and do it...

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No, you don't. What you have is se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, you don't. What you have is seven honest men, who thought it forthcoming to tell you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: You: "(Bow to the bearded man.) "Gangs ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Bow to the bearded man.) "Gangs are usually run by the oldest, most venerable member."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Like what, copper?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like what, copper?"

fields.Title: Drama: "Just keep it simple. He said they k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just keep it simple. He said they killed him. These uninitiated do not understand the fineries of Runic Science.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Guess what -- I've come upon somet..."]
You: "(Address Elizabeth.) "I don't have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Address Elizabeth.) "I don't have to. One of them was more complicit than others."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: "Titus grins. "I think you got your..."]
Eugene: ""Yeah -- really. Had a gin and toni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- really. Had a gin and tonic up there, sang some Oranjese paratrooper song, and said he's gonna fuck everyone."

fields.Title: Half Light: "It won't be for long, she means."
fields.Dialogue Text: It won't be for long, she means.

fields.Title: You: ""I need to talk to the victim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need to talk to the victim."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "No, he hasn't. Not yet."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, he hasn't. Not yet.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""And fuck you too, copper -- pickin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And fuck you too, copper -- picking on Angus like this. We're done with this schoolyard shit. And just so you know, he *doesn't* have trouble breathing."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Not in the *arresting mood*?" His..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not in the *arresting mood*?" His mean little eyes come alive with hatred.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "No such luck. Even *he* has a gun."
fields.Dialogue Text: No such luck. Even *he* has a gun.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "This is where the first shot will c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is where the first shot will come from.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Good luck with that." He grabs ano..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck with that." He grabs another beer. "You've heard everything a *rent-a-cop* is gonna hear from us *real* law officials. You're lucky you didn't get a beating."

fields.Title: Empathy: "There's slight unease in him, sudde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's slight unease in him, suddenly. He regrets mentioning the rape.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "A trick question. Don't let her lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A trick question. Don't let her lead the conversation.

fields.Title: You: ""When did this *hanging incident* o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When did this *hanging incident* occur?"

fields.Title: Glen: ""*Known* him?! We don't associate w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Known* him?! We don't associate with scum like that, asshole!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry," the lieutenant catch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry," the lieutenant catches Titus's glance. "We're *resourceful*. We'll find a good topic for us to discuss."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Well," he says. "You're not comple..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well," he says. "You're not completely off. We *did* kill him -- we took him out back and hung him by the neck. Until he was dead."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "We had to have *something*. His foo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We had to have *something*. His foot-tapping has become less patient now.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Incriminating... now that's a big..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Incriminating... now that's a big boy word." He puts his beer can down.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "There's a catch hidden somewhere. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a catch hidden somewhere. He didn't confess so that you could take them all away. It's too simple.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to ask for one last time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to ask for one last time: Who did the dead man rape?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Certainly enough to not put up with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Certainly enough to not put up with this back-sass. Deliver a knock-down observation.

fields.Title: You: "All of them? Maybe *one* of them is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All of them? Maybe *one* of them is fidgeting, cracking under the pressure?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, lawman." He takes a step clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, lawman." He takes a step closer as well, fixing his ball cap. "Why *don't* you?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "Beneath everything he's just a litt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beneath everything he's just a little bit grateful you didn't force him to get ugly.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Ain't no use keeping a stiff catal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ain't no use keeping a stiff catalogue in your head, that's for sure." He wipes his mouth with the back of his hand.

fields.Title: You: ""How long had you known the victim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long had you known the victim?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The autopsy showed there were no l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The autopsy showed there were no ligature marks. His hands were not tied. Can you explain that?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you doing, officer?" He l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you doing, officer?" He lowers his voice. "We had enough questions to keep this going."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You should have kept pushing if you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should have kept pushing if you had something.

fields.Title: You: ""A-ha, so you just confess to murde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A-ha, so you just confess to murder?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "Titus grins. "I think you got your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus grins. "I think you got your answer, Mr. Law."

fields.Title: You: ""'Pines cow', who's that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Pines cow', who's that?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "The lieutenant goes in for the leg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant goes in for the leg sweep -- Titus does not see it coming.

fields.Title: Fat Angus: ""No." He looks up, startled, his fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." He looks up, startled, his forehead shiny from sweat. A few coiled locks are peeking out from under his warm woollen hat.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Of course he's having trouble brea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course he's having trouble breathing -- just look at how fucking fat he is!" The man next to the big guy bursts out laughing.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""That's right, lawman." He spits th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right, lawman." He spits through his teeth. "And then we hanged the fuck."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "All -- seven -- together. They're d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All -- seven -- together. They're diluting responsibility. It's an anti-arrest tactic.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The River Esperance Correctional Fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The River Esperance Correctional Facility -- a military prison run by the Coalition, dubbed *Reunion* by the inmates. The origin of the name is unknown.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""That's enough insinuation for toda..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's enough insinuation for today, Titus." She turns to you. "Officer, your interview is drawing to an end. Don't waste your last questions."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Why?" he hisses through his teeth...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?" he hisses through his teeth. "Because he was worthless mercenary scum -- *and* he stepped out of line. In *my* town."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Yeah, this girl's on the mic, a be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, this girl's on the mic, a beautiful girl, young. Gets into the second verse of 'Lover Lake'. The fucker grabs her legs, starts screaming..."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Titus, do *not* answer. You have b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus, do *not* answer. You have been forthcoming enough."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, besides crimes against karao..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, besides crimes against karaoke, what did he actually do wrong?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Seems like they don't want to talk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems like they don't want to talk about that rape Titus mentioned. Why not? This is a serious allegation. Make them talk about it.

fields.Title: Logic: "This is where an autopsy would come..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is where an autopsy would come in handy -- you have to work with what you know.

fields.Title: Alain: ""Right fucking here." He spreads hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right fucking here." He spreads his hands. "Eugene already told you that the fuck had started coming to *our* bar..."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Right fucking here." He spreads hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right fucking here." He spreads his hands. "The fucker started coming to our bar. Asking for it."

fields.Title: You: "First, tell me who's solid?"
fields.Dialogue Text: First, tell me who's solid?

fields.Title: You: "Who's cracking under the pressure?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who's cracking under the pressure?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Fuck off, Shanky," the big boss st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck off, Shanky," the big boss steps in. "Angus is a powerful guy. All muscle."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The bore's the size of your eye. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bore's the size of your eye. I can almost see the stars.

fields.Title: You: ""Fine, I only have one pair of hand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine, I only have one pair of handcuffs anyway." (Back off.)

fields.Title: You: ""You're involved. Somehow. I just d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're involved. Somehow. I just don't have proof -- yet."

fields.Title: You: ""I have spoken to the head of the U..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have spoken to the head of the Union."
fields.Alternate1: "We have spoken to the head of the Union."

fields.Title: You: ""So, what are we going to do now?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, what are we going to do now?" (Conclude the questioning.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We hanged him up by his neck until..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We hanged him up by his neck until he got real still. Wasn't that obvious, copper?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Quiet!" Titus gives Glen a stern l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Quiet!" Titus gives Glen a stern look. "He came around 'bout three weeks ago, when that *Pines* cow first sailed into town. Happy?"

fields.Title: You: "Things aren't quite right here, are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Things aren't quite right here, are they?
fields.tooltip2: Strange answer to the tied hands.

fields.Title: You: ""Glad we cleared that up.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glad we cleared that up."

fields.Title: Half Light: "The man gets a strange gleam in his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man gets a strange gleam in his eyes. His fists contract as if going through the pulling motion again, savouring it.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We did this," -- he looks you dead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We did this," -- he looks you dead in the eye -- "together. All of us. Until he was dead. That's why there's a container belt around his neck."

fields.Title: Half Light: "As he speaks, his fists contract, g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As he speaks, his fists contract, going through the pulling motion again, savouring it.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, go arrest communism!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, go arrest communism!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, no," the lieutenant says, calm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no," the lieutenant says, calmly. "We'll stay here and discuss what happened that night."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By the 'Pines cow' you mean Joyce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the 'Pines cow' you mean Joyce Messier, the representative for Wild Pines?" The lieutenant pretends to check his notes. "The same company you're striking against?"

fields.Title: Eugene: ""'Show me your cunt! Why don't you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Show me your cunt! Why don't you show me your cunt?' Then he gets knocked on the head with a wine bottle -- doesn't even fall down!" He shakes his head in disbelief.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What about him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about him?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where did all this action take pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where did all this action take place?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Rent-a-cop? So that's what this is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rent-a-cop? So that's what this is about. He doesn't see you as his equal.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He killed the guy for stepping out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He killed the guy for stepping out of line? What, is Mr. Titus Hardie here a *fascist*? No sir, he is not. Get to the bottom of it. Ask again.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Are you deaf? There will be no sin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you deaf? There will be no singling anyone out. You can't arrest *a* Hardie boy without arresting *all* Hardie boys."

fields.Title: You: "(Point at Elizabeth.) "I thought sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point at Elizabeth.) "I thought she did."

fields.Title: Composure: "Titus is solid as a rock, and so ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus is solid as a rock, and so are a few others, but...

fields.Title: You: "(Lie) "He told me it was you who ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Lie) "He told me it was you who killed him. Why is that?"

fields.Title: You: ""Guess what -- I've come upon somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Guess what -- I've come upon something incriminating."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["whirling.hardie_lynching_evidence_hub_reached"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.hardie_lynching_hub_reached"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"] == true  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"] == true  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"] == true  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"] == true  or  Variable["cargo.belt_vermillion_connection_made"] == true

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No." The woman interjects. "These..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." The woman interjects. "These *seven* honest men have *equally* come forth. They told you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""That's for the courts in Le Jardin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's for the courts in Le Jardin to decide, not for the officer making an arrest. Which we all know you won't be."

fields.Title: Theo: "The old man lets out an annoyed cou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old man lets out an annoyed cough, then reaches into his pocket for another cigarette.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Why don't you ask *her* about the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't you ask *her* about the Pretty Boy? I'm sure she has interesting things to say -- when you ask her *hard* enough."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Yeah, he said it was his 'favourit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, he said it was his 'favourite joint' now, started coming here every night! Drinking, grabbing girls -- grabbed one of ours mid-karaoke. Right there on the stage!"

fields.Title: You: ""Was this the same girl who was sex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was this the same girl who was sexually assaulted -- *raped*, you said?"

fields.Title: You: ""Right, but *who* did he rape then?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, but *who* did he rape then? This is a very serious allegation."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "All mighty god! Even Dick Mullen on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All mighty god! Even Dick Mullen only has a .45!

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Am I gonna have to?" He tilts his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Am I gonna have to?" He tilts his head like a hawk, eyes narrowing to a mere shadow beneath his ball cap.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""How the fuck do I know? Anyone cou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How the fuck do I know? Anyone could have shot him. Target practice maybe?" Another sip. He's tight-lipped suddenly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've done this job for long enough..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've done this job for long enough to know that people don't just confess to first-degree murder. *Even* if it is a group responsibility. We're going to look into this."

fields.Title: Composure: "This isn't a man who just loses his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't a man who just loses his cool in a murderous way. There was more than one line crossed. The situation must have been beyond critical. Ask him again why he did it.

fields.Title: You: ""Why are your boot prints all over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are your boot prints all over the scene?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Can you give us a few more details..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you give us a few more details? Did you muffle him? We haven't heard any reports of screams."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Maybe wrap it up instead?" She doe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe wrap it up instead?" She doesn't even look at you.

fields.Title: Logic: "We've hit a wall. Giving the body a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We've hit a wall. Giving the body a more thorough look might give us some leverage. Just saying.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""The Pretty Boy?" He takes a sip fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Pretty Boy?" He takes a sip from his can. "You guys really love talking about that Pretty Boy..."
fields.Alternate1: "The Pretty Boy?" He takes a sip from his can. "You really *love* talking about him..."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes -- him.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- him."

fields.Title: You: ""I wanna talk about the hanging aga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wanna talk about the hanging again."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""I wanna talk about the hanging aga..."]
Shanky: ""It's not the fat-ass!" the scrawny..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not the fat-ass!" the scrawny guy shrieks. "Titus runs the Hardie boys, genius! That's why we're called the *Hardie boys*, ain't that right, fellas?"

fields.Title: You: ""Right, but what did he actually do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, but what did he actually do *wrong*?"

fields.Title: You: ""How did you manage to overpower hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you manage to overpower him?"
fields.Alternate1: "Wasn't he a trained killer, from Oranjese special forces? If yes, then how did you manage to overpower him?"

fields.Title: You: ""Mr. Tatts, what did you use to kno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Tatts, what did you use to knock the victim out?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "That definitely caught him off guar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That definitely caught him off guard. In comes No. 2 to take care of it.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Easy. Walk back from the provocatio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Easy. Walk back from the provocation. They're armed, and they outnumber us. The lieutenant tries to establish eye contact with you.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "That's an Ister 50. A Zsiemsk-made..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's an Ister 50. A Zsiemsk-made monstrosity. It'll blow your head clean off.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't *actually* want to hurt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't *actually* want to hurt you. There's an easy way out of this -- a self-deprecating joke.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No." The woman interjects. "These..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." The woman interjects. "These *seven* honest men have *equally* come forth. They told you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""The stupid-ass cow Wild Pines sent..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The stupid-ass cow Wild Pines sent to fuck us over. But you know what..." He rubs his chin.

fields.Title: Alain: ""Or sent them to Reunion to *rot* -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or sent them to Reunion to *rot* -- for twenty years, for *life*?!" He says it as if it were worse than dying.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Didn't they teach you *anything* a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Didn't they teach you *anything* at the cop school, idiot?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No, no, no..." He shakes his head:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, no..." He shakes his head: "FUCK NO! The big dick is right here, asshole! You're looking at it!" He grabs his crotch. "Right fucking here!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What kind of mercenary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of mercenary?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""The kind that shows up when you st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The kind that shows up when you start a strike. The *experienced* kind, too. Had Co Hoi and Semenine written all over him -- ex-Oranjese Special Forces."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "He looks you dead in the eye. "Beca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks you dead in the eye. "Because we *did*. All of us together. I hope he told the story straight. I hope he told it well."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Container belt? Like we use in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Container belt? Like we use in the harbour?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Vermillion? Like we use in the har..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Vermillion? Like we use in the harbour?"

fields.Title: Shanky: "A burst of laughter in the room; th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A burst of laughter in the room; the little guy is the loudest. "Good one, Titus!" he fawns.

fields.Title: Variable["yard.hanged_spoke_to_the_corpse"]  or  (Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"]  and  Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])  or  Variable["cargo.containeryard_finish_the_pile_of_belts_thought"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"]  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"]

Variable["yard.hanged_spoke_to_the_corpse"]  or  (Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"]  and  Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])  or  Variable["cargo.containeryard_finish_the_pile_of_belts_thought"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"]  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"]

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_spoke_to_the_corpse"]  or  (Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"]  and  Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])  or  Variable["cargo.containeryard_finish_the_pile_of_belts_thought"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"]  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"]

fields.Title: !(Variable["yard.hanged_spoke_to_the_corpse"]  or  (Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"]  and  Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])  or  Variable["cargo.containeryard_finish_the_pile_of_belts_thought"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"]  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"])

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["yard.hanged_spoke_to_the_corpse"]  or  (Variable["whirling.hardie_postviscal_scan"]  and  Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])  or  Variable["cargo.containeryard_finish_the_pile_of_belts_thought"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_airlifting_carfo"]  or  Variable["yard.hanged_rope_industrial_strength"]  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_hardieboys_did_the_merco_in"]) == false

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Chaise électrique is the method of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Chaise électrique is the method of capital punishment in Revachol under the Coalition. During the Suzerain's reign it used to be the firing squad.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's clearly been in solitary confi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's clearly been in solitary confinement -- and at a young age, nonetheless.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You keep him the fuck out of this...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You keep him the fuck out of this." He leans toward you. "We have *autonomy*. It's all on us. Evrart runs the Union -- *I* run the Hardie boys."

fields.Title: You: ""So he was a mercenary, that's it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So he was a mercenary, that's it?"

fields.Title: You: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: Alain: ""My fucking elbow, copper." He look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My fucking elbow, copper." He looks you straight in the eye. "Samaran boxing-style."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Right fucking here." He looks arou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right fucking here." He looks around. "The fucker pranced in here like he owns the place -- got what was coming to him."

fields.Title: Eugene: "Him neither. Mostly keeps to his to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Him neither. Mostly keeps to his tomato juice, or whatever he's got there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "By your side, the lieutenant keeps..."
fields.Dialogue Text: By your side, the lieutenant keeps his hand away from his holster. You hear the nylon of his coat hiss as he steps closer.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Tomato juice? Just tomato juice? A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tomato juice? Just tomato juice? A non-alcoholic tomato juice? What's the point of that?

fields.Title: Half Light: "No, fuck him. Murder rage never cam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, fuck him. Murder rage never came from *nothing*. Hit him with the question again -- why'd he fucking do it?

fields.Title: You: ""Why did you kill him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why did you kill him?"
fields.Alternate1: "I'm going to ask you again, Titus. Why'd you kill him?"

fields.Title: You: ""Honestly, I drink so much I can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I drink so much I can't really remember anyone I've sent behind bars."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "Titus grins. "Rest assured, lawman,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus grins. "Rest assured, lawman, none worse than our guy. He got what was coming to him."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""You don't have to answer any of hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't have to answer any of his questions," the fixer turns to remind Titus.
fields.Alternate1: "You don't have to keep answering his questions," the fixer turns to remind Titus.

fields.Title: You: ""The autopsy revealed the victim's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The autopsy revealed the victim's hands were not tied. No signs of struggle. How do you explain *that*?"
fields.Alternate1: "Now *you* listen to *me*, Sonny-Jim. The autopsy showed the victim's hands weren't tied. No signs of struggle. Explain this and make it 'real simple'."

fields.Title: You: ""Why was there a *Vermillion* belt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why was there a *Vermillion* belt around his neck?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""They love him, boss. Spent all day..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They love him, boss. Spent all day digging around in there. Can't get enough of that Pretty Boy smell."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You had something other than the bi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You had something other than the bizarre vision too, right? You better have something, because this didn't work.

fields.Title: You: "(Address Titus.) "No, but seriously..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Address Titus.) "No, but seriously -- who calls the shots around here?"

fields.Title: You: ""It's the eighth Hardie boy. The on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's the eighth Hardie boy. The one who's missing. The big dick."

fields.Title: Fat Angus: "The sweaty man turns red and looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sweaty man turns red and looks first down, then around him, apologetically.

fields.Title: Eugene: ""A live grenade." The man spreads h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A live grenade." The man spreads his arms. "Right here in *our* bar!"

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Cause one night he walked straight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cause one night he walked straight up to the mic and said: 'I'm Oranjese goddamn Special Forces and I'm gonna fuck you all'."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""... to kill us all if we don't ope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... to kill us all if we don't open the gates, if we don't let the scabs in. If we don't bend over." He cracks his knuckles. "And that was *before* he started coming *here*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He grabbed someone?" The lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He grabbed someone?" The lieutenant is trying to make sense of this flood of information.

fields.Title: You: ""Embarrassment? That's idiotic. I n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Embarrassment? That's idiotic. I need to talk to her."

fields.Title: Endurance: "A single sentence would wear him ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A single sentence would wear him out. He can't take the *length* of the questioning. Keep it going long enough and he'll crack.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, you!" (Turn to the big guy.)..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, you!" (Turn to the big guy.) "You having trouble breathing over there?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "A fearful readiness, like an electr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A fearful readiness, like an electrical charge, raises hairs in the room.

fields.Title: You: ""You're under arrest." (Grab his wr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're under arrest." (Grab his wrist.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "Beneath everything he's grateful, j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beneath everything he's grateful, just a bit. You don't force him to get ugly.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yes, run home, lonely *rent-a-cop*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, run home, lonely *rent-a-cop*." He grabs another beer. "*Real* law officials are done with you. You're lucky you didn't get a beating."

fields.Title: Composure: "Keep your eye on this 'powerful guy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep your eye on this 'powerful guy'. Sooner or later he's going to break like a piece of twig.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This was a good move. Also, notice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This was a good move. Also, notice how Titus doesn't *like* her much. Especially when she's calling the shots.

fields.Title: You: ""Be more specific. How did you subd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Be more specific. How did you subdue him?"

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of mercenary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of mercenary?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Why?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""How many people have you sent to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How many people have you sent to the *chaise*? Ever felt remorse for them?"

fields.Title: You: "(Point at the harbour.) "Evrart Cla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point at the harbour.) "Evrart Claire runs the Union. You answer to him, right?"

fields.Title: Authority: "He *has* authority in the group, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He *has* authority in the group, but it wasn't him calling the shots that night. Hasn't been him for a long time.

fields.Title: Authority: "He wasn't calling the shots that ni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He wasn't calling the shots that night... or any night. If anything, he was used as a tool -- for carrying, or clean-up.

fields.Title: You: ""By the 'Pines cow' you mean Joyce,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the 'Pines cow' you mean Joyce, the negotiator for Wild Pines?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Wrong?!" he roars. "He harassed wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wrong?!" he roars. "He harassed women. Raped one. Harassed workers. Threatened to kill some as a *warning*..." He wipes spittle from his mouth.

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Yeah, man, weren't you listening?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, man, weren't you listening?"

fields.Title: Composure: "This one is a stone wall. You won't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one is a stone wall. You won't get more out of them about the night of the murder -- not yet.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""The little guy? *You're* the littl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The little guy? *You're* the little guy now," he grins, the gap in his teeth like a rotting hole.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Countless lines separate life and d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Countless lines separate life and death. What terminal boundary was crossed here? Men like Titus don't murder over nothing. Ask him again.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The last thing you hear is a little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The last thing you hear is a little murmur. Not a blast, not an echo. No one screams. It's impossible to say where it comes from...

fields.Title: You: ""What I do is *different*. I enforc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What I do is *different*. I enforce the law. You just kill people like it's nothing."
fields.Alternate1: "What we do is *different*. We enforce the law. You just kill people like it's nothing."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""But you see, a *law*, lawman," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But you see, a *law*, lawman," he says, squeezing his beer can, "is something people agree upon.  And here in Martinaise we agreed that this man had to die."

fields.Title: You: ""Right. Maybe another question then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Maybe another question then?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We overpowered him, dragged his un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We overpowered him, dragged his unconscious body to the tree, put a noose around his neck and hanged him 'til he was dead and steady."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Uh... we, huh..." He looks even mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh... we, huh..." He looks even more irritated than before. "Look, I'm not gonna play Twenty Questions with you, coppo. I'll say it again: We killed him."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Disregard the outburst, officer."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disregard the outburst, officer." She gives Titus a condescending glance. "None of the boys have any more comments on their power relations. That night they acted as one. That's all."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Evrart?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Funny," the lieutenant says withou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny," the lieutenant says without a smile. "But my partner and I have a serious matter to discuss with you."

fields.Title: You: ""He said communism killed him.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He said communism killed him."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Well, what'cha chatting me up for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, what'cha chatting me up for then? Go arrest communism before it skips town."

fields.Title: Authority: "They're playing to their *considera..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're playing to their *considerable* strength in numbers. Don't talk about arresting them. You'll only bring attention to your inability to do so.

fields.Title: You: "And Reunion, what's that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And Reunion, what's that?

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Theo's a great guy, a great guy, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Theo's a great guy, a great guy, but c'mon..." He spreads his arms. "*Titus Hardie* runs the Hardie boys. That's why we're called the *Hardie boys*, genius!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: ""...that there's any question who's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...that there's any question who's the leader." That's how he would have ended it. Titus won't let him.

fields.Title: Authority: "That's it. There's some kind of pow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's it. There's some kind of power issue they don't want to admit -- and the missing Hardie is involved.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I can't prove it, but I *know* he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't prove it, but I *know* he was sent by the Wild Pines. They hire merc-shit like that. Story of every strike from here to Samara."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "From rape -- to harassment -- to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From rape -- to harassment -- to threats of violence -- why the strange de-escalation?

fields.Title: Authority: "They keep speaking for Titus so tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They keep speaking for Titus so that he wouldn't get his hands muddy with too much explaining.

fields.Title: Authority: "Titus lets the others clear out the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus lets the others clear out the details -- so he doesn't get his hands muddy with explaining too much.

fields.Title: You: ""There's something you're not telli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's something you're not telling me."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Good one." The big man nods, but h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good one." The big man nods, but he's not laughing. "You need to go and cool off right now, copper. Can't joke your way out of the next one."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Nothing," her reply comes sharp. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing," her reply comes sharp. "Your investigation here is done. You should go back to Jamrock -- to your station, where you belong."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Okay, besides crimes against karao..."]
Encyclopedia: "Samaran boxing, or *Sam Bo*, is an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Samaran boxing, or *Sam Bo*, is an eloquently violent set of one-on-one fighting moves originating from the Samaran isola. *Sam Bo style* implies stealth, cleverness, and cool.

fields.Title: You: ""I have spoken to the dead man -- i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have spoken to the dead man -- in a *bizarre* occult vision."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""That's right, asshole! Titus Hardi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right, asshole! Titus Hardie runs the Hardie boys! Ain't that so, fellas?" He looks around for approval.

fields.Title: Alain: ""Yeah, *I* knocked him out." The ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, *I* knocked him out." The tattooed one speaks up, banging on his chest. "Came up behind him and clubbed him in the back of the head. He went down like a sack of sand."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Why not? Yap my ear off, I got not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not? Yap my ear off, I got nothing to hide."

fields.Title: You: ""Honestly, the occult vision was to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, the occult vision was too confusing for me to understand."

fields.Title: You: ""That's it, the game's over. I got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it, the game's over. I got the perpetrator!"
fields.Alternate1: "That's it, the game's over. We got the perpetrator!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This isn't something he came up wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't something he came up with on the spot. It's his standard reasoning -- a product of many years of being Titus Hardie.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "He nods to his friend. "The fucker..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods to his friend. "The fucker got what was coming to him. Our conscience is clean."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Yes, there are *some* administrati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, there are *some* administrative differences," she gives Titus a stern look, "but on that night they all acted as *one* man."

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, how do you even know he w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, how do you even know he was in special forces?"

fields.Title: Drama: "Sire, the tale is true."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sire, the tale is true.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What you *need* is to get THE FUCK..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What you *need* is to get THE FUCK OUT OF MY FACE!" You hear the aluminium crack in his palm as he squeezes the beer can. "I've had enough of explaining myself to you fucks. He's dead, it's done!"

fields.Title: Drama: "This one has a distinct style. He p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one has a distinct style. He puts so much whiny emotion into everything he says it's hard to see if he's lying. But he *could* be.

fields.Title: Empathy: "His 'all muscle' comment wasn't sar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His 'all muscle' comment wasn't sarcastic. He's genuinely trying to look out for Angus.

fields.Title: You: ""Easy now. Let's just talk." (Back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy now. Let's just talk." (Back off.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Wise move." He leans back against..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wise move." He leans back against the table. "You made the right choice there. Now make another one and get the fuck out of our booth. We're not gonna do this again."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Huh?!" A sip of beer makes the sur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh?!" A sip of beer makes the surprise go down easier.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Who do you fucking think does?" He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who do you fucking think does?" He sounds more amused than angry.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""This asshole is worse than..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This asshole is worse than..." He falls silent. "Titus runs the Hardie boys, genius! That's why we're called the *Hardie boys*, ain't that right, fellas?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""*Doesn't remember them*!" the rat-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Doesn't remember them*!" the rat-faced man shouts. "He just forgets! Are you hearing this, Titus?"

fields.Title: You: ""No more questions.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No more questions."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""So am I. Now how about you get the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So am I. Now how about you get the fuck out of my town?"

fields.Title: Authority: "You stepped on some big toes there...."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stepped on some big toes there. Tried to take out a satellite. That's not how it's going to go. They'd rather rot in jail than implicate Mr. Claire in this mess.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By the 'Pines cow', you mean the r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the 'Pines cow', you mean the representative for Wild Pines?" The lieutenant checks his notes. "The shipping company you're striking against?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""*And* he stepped out of line," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*And* he stepped out of line," he repeats, jaw clamped shut like a vice.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""We couldn't believe it, either. Bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We couldn't believe it, either. But he fucking did. Right there," he points at the stage, "like some kind of animal."

fields.Title: You: ""Cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He regrets mentioning it, hopes you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He regrets mentioning it, hopes you didn't notice.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, why are they reaching for the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, why are they reaching for their belts?

fields.Title: You: ""How does the *bullet* in his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How does the *bullet* in his head factor into this?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a bullet in the dead man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a bullet in the dead man's brain," the lieutenant checks his notes. "Why was it there, if you hanged him?"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""There is no catch. These seven hon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no catch. These seven honest men have all *equally* come forth to tell you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Right, but what did he actually do..."]
Elizabeth: "She sounds almost helpful: "What yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She sounds almost helpful: "What you *can* do right now is go back to your station and write a *report*."

fields.Title: You: "(Point at Fat-Angus.) "The biggest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point at Fat-Angus.) "The biggest animal dominates the herd. I'm guessing it's the big one."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Then we left him for seagulls, mag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then we left him for seagulls, maggots," the small man points at you, "and you fucks."

fields.Title: You: ""Right, I have other questions abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, I have other questions about the lynching."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You mean *these* boots?" He raises..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean *these* boots?" He raises his worker boot -- size 46, steel reinforced toe.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamn right, I...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn right, I..."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Oh, so you're just a simple, well-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, so you're just a simple, well-meaning man, huh?" He spits on the ground before him. "Ever been in solitary? Prison is *torture*, that's what it is."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So is hanging a man slowly, withou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So is hanging a man slowly, without breaking his neck," the lieutenant replies dryly.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No," he stresses, "I mean *the Pin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," he stresses, "I mean *the Pines cow*. The stupid-ass cow they sent in to fuck us over. But you know what..." He rubs his chin, pretending to mull it over.

fields.Title: You: ""He grabbed someone?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He grabbed someone?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What are you talking about -- emba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about -- embarrassment? If someone has been sexually assaulted, we need to..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""With *numbers*, asshole, how do yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With *numbers*, asshole, how do you think?" He looks at the woman. "You're right, Lizzy, I've done enough explaining here."

fields.Title: Alain: "Alain -- who looks like he might be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alain -- who looks like he might be Titus' right hand man. The least antsy of the bunch; definitely not his first time being questioned by the police.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Look, coppers." Titus opens up his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, coppers." Titus opens up his vest, revealing a holstered firearm. "I know you think you're doing your job here, but there are *seven* of us and two of you."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Guns are stocked between the belts..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Guns are stocked between the belts -- three, maybe four firearms. Although Fat Angus might be just pulling up his pants, not sure...

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""So, little guy," the frontman nods..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, little guy," the frontman nods, still not smiling. "You had some questions?"

fields.Title: Drama: "Interesting, sire. It's as if he's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Interesting, sire. It's as if he's lying -- to *protect* someone. He's not very good at it.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""This line of questioning is *over*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This line of questioning is *over*," the woman steps in before you can answer. "You got the cause of death already. Hanging. If there's any *post-mortem* trauma, it's your problem. This will not turn into a cross-examination."

fields.Title: You: ""Why's there a container belt aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why's there a container belt around the dead man's neck?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I'm getting a bizarre message from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm getting a bizarre message from Angus's stomach right now. It says... wait, what is it saying, Angie?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "This one has a special gripe with h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one has a special gripe with him coming here.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: You: ""He said love did him in.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He said love did him in."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We had something else. Beside the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We had something else. Beside the *occult vision*..." He turns to you.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "But... they don't *want* you back a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But... they don't *want* you back at the station, do they?

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No. You did not get an answer. Tit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You did not get an answer. Titus does *administrative* work. He pushes paper. Fills out forms -- the others can't read. But on that night they all acted as *one* man."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Fuck off, cop." He does take the a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck off, cop." He does take the advice. "She's gone through enough without you harassing her too. She doesn't need more embarrassment."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: "The woman turns to you, calmly: "As..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman turns to you, calmly: "As you can see, these men can only take so much baseless scrutiny. I'm doing my best to keep the situation civil, but..." What follows is a slow headshake.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It's true. She was the only thing h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's true. She was the only thing holding him back.

fields.Title: Logic: "Make them a bit more uncomfortable..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Make them a bit more uncomfortable first, *then* see if it all adds up.

fields.Title: Volition: "Just because you *can* doesn't mean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just because you *can* doesn't mean you *have to* say everything that comes to mind. Back out before the situation escalates.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's grateful. Just a little, somew..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's grateful. Just a little, somewhere down there. You didn't force him to get ugly.

fields.Title: You: ""An Ister 50. You could blow Dick M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An Ister 50. You could blow Dick Mullen away with that." (Back off.)

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, *little* questions." A snick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, *little* questions." A snicker and a sneer from the corner.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Nothing," her reply comes sharp. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing," her reply comes sharp. "Your investigation here is done. Leave Martinaise, go back to your stations, where you belong."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Rent-a-cop? So that's what this is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rent-a-cop? So that's what this is about. He doesn't see you as his equals.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Forget about their games. You've ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forget about their games. You've mapped out the characters -- reading the footprints in the yard should be easier now.

fields.Title: You: "(Point at Titus.) "You do. You give..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Point at Titus.) "You do. You give the commands."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I know, Lizzy, relax." He takes a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know, Lizzy, relax." He takes a sip. "We killed him last Sunday night. Seemed like a good way to end the week."

fields.Title: Authority: "You're pretty sure you've had at le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're pretty sure you've had at least two years of *cop school* and many more of active service.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Titus, you don't have to clarify a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus, you don't have to clarify anything."

fields.Title: You: ""Understood. Next question.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. Next question."

fields.Title: Authority: "He's so sure it's him -- but it's n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's so sure it's him -- but it's not that simple. There's someone above him (or beside him?) sharing the leadership. Hard to say who...

fields.Title: You: ""The man hanged in the backyard --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The man hanged in the backyard -- did you do it?"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""There is no catch. These seven hon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no catch. These seven honest men have all *equally* come forth to tell you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Aren't you fucking listening? My m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aren't you fucking listening? My man is talking to you. He took *care* of it. They got the girl out before anything else could happen."

fields.Title: Drama: "There's something odd here."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something odd here.

fields.Title: Volition: "There's nothing you can do for now...."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's nothing you can do for now. He's stonewalling you.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Fuck off, copper." He just shakes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck off, copper." He just shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: ""Why don't I just arrest you?" (Ste..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't I just arrest you?" (Step closer to Titus.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Look, cop..." Titus opens up his v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, cop..." Titus opens up his vest, revealing a holstered firearm. "I know you think you're doing your job here, but there are *seven* of us and just one of you."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "The little rat-faced man reaches in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The little rat-faced man reaches into his sleeve... there's a *knife* in there! Some of the others reach for their belts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That won't be necessary. Let's jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That won't be necessary. Let's just all cool off." He pulls you along and steps out of the booth.

fields.Title: Glen: ""It wasn't a question, dickwad! How..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It wasn't a question, dickwad! How fucking stupid are you?"

fields.Title: Composure: "Actually, they're admirably -- surp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, they're admirably -- surprisingly -- composed. The entire room. Given how many questions you've lobbed their way.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""So you're not just here to swing y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're not just here to swing your big dick -- you're here for the Pretty Boy? A real looker that one..." He shakes his head. "Stinks like *shit* too."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Evidence. Show them you have it. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Evidence. Show them you have it. It doesn't have to be conclusive.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "There was a speck of truth in there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There was a speck of truth in there for him. You accidentally touched something.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No, you don't. What you have is se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, you don't. What you have is seven honest men, who thought it forthcoming to tell you what happened -- so that you don't waste any more of your time."

fields.Title: You: ""Look, I'm just doing my job, that'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, I'm just doing my job, that's all."

fields.Title: Authority: "Titus. Keep addressing him. He *wan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus. Keep addressing him. He *wants* everyone to know he's in charge.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""When Titus Hardie says he *runs* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When Titus Hardie says he *runs* the Hardie boys," the woman adds, "he means that in an *administrative* capacity. On that night everyone acted as *one* man."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This is a serious violation of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a serious violation of the karaoke code.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Weren't you fucking listening. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Weren't you fucking listening. The fucker came to *our bar!*" He looks around. "It happened right here."

fields.Title: Shanky: "Well, this one -- but he's *always*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, this one -- but he's *always* fidgeting, so don't get your hopes up.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "From the back of the room -- a litt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From the back of the room -- a little pop. You hear the brass button opening on Alain's belt holster.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That won't be necessary. We'll be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That won't be necessary. We'll be on our way for now. Let everybody cool off a bit." He pulls you along.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Again? Someone ask the guy for an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Again? Someone ask the guy for an autograph -- you cops are his biggest fans."

fields.Title: Glen: "A moment of silence. The long haire..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A moment of silence. The long haired one breaks it: "Titus, no one was thinking..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""And what did he tell you?" His eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what did he tell you?" His eyes narrow. "That we killed him? That we took a cargo belt from the harbour, went out back, and used it to hang him?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Because we took it," he says, "fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because we took it," he says, "from the harbour where we work. Then we went out back and used it to *hang* him."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""They couldn't get him down boss. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They couldn't get him down boss. He's still up there, stinking up the place." The small guy smirks.

fields.Title: Half Light: "As he speaks, his fists contract, g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As he speaks, his fists contract, going through the pulling motion again, savouring it.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""That *is* fucking bizarre. A magic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That *is* fucking bizarre. A magic-man, a goddamn magician..." he shakes his head.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Well well, fortune teller." He squ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well well, fortune teller." He squints at you, assessing your sincerity. "You might be on to something -- they don't just end up in trees for nothing."

fields.Title: Fat Angus: ""Says they ain't got shit, boss.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Says they ain't got shit, boss."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, me and Eugene got her out. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, me and Eugene got her out. Aren't you fucking listening?!" he repeats like a parrot.

fields.Title: Volition: "Despite the stonewalling you can sl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Despite the stonewalling you can slip one more question in.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "While the little rat-faced man reac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: While the little rat-faced man reaches into his sleeve... there's a *knife* in there! Some of the others reach for their belts, their eyes alight.

fields.Title: You: ""The little guy was right. I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The little guy was right. I'm not in the arresting mood." (Back off.)

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He's just glad you're both safe for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's just glad you're both safe for now.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The last thing you hear is a little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The last thing you hear is a little murmur. Not a blast, not an echo. No one screams. It's impossible to say where it comes from...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we're going to stick aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we're going to stick around, thanks. Some things don't add up here, Titus." The lieutenant closes his notebook.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Do you think you could do that? Do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think you could do that? Do you think you could arrest them all?" A shadow of a smirk passes her lips, as she tilts her head.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to ask you again, Titus...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to ask you again, Titus. Why'd you kill him?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who called the shots that night?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who called the shots that night?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, but these were all *bad peopl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, but these were all *bad people* -- criminals, the scum of the earth."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, we did this." He looks you d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, we did this." He looks you dead in the eye. "Together. All of us. Until he was dead. That's why our prints are all over the scene."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We did this --" he looks you dead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We did this --" he looks you dead in the eye, "-- together. All of us. Last Sunday night. So maybe... that's why he told you what he told you?"

fields.Title: You: "(Squint your eyes.) "But there's a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Squint your eyes.) "But there's a catch..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She probably knows you're not welco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She probably knows you're not welcome there... somehow she does.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then. Now, about the man you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then. Now, about the man you killed..." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No." There's a moment of silence...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." There's a moment of silence. "You're not getting a name. That's a Martinaise matter and I'm not discussing it with you clowns."

fields.Title: You: ""Where did this *overpowering* happ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where did this *overpowering* happen?"

fields.Title: Drama: "He may be lying, but he's good at i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He may be lying, but he's good at it. No twitching, no rushing, no uncalled-for details.

fields.Title: You: ""You confessed to murder. I'm takin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You confessed to murder. I'm taking you in." (Step even closer.)
